altername_name: Hidden Objects: Objetos Ocultos: Historias de Miedo
name: Hidden Objects: Mystery Stories
overview: Find the clues... Solve the crime... Unravel the mystery! Hidden object game with a good mix of puzzles and types of hidden object scenes. Storyline starts on a tropical island with a mystery involving a Mayan curse. It continues in Berlin, delving into long buried secrets.
